name: Eurodry Ltd.
description: Eurodry Ltd. is a provider of dry bulk shipping services. The company, which was founded in 2018, operates a fleet of modern vessels that transport a variety of dry bulk commodities, including grains, fertilizers, coal, and other materials essential for global trade. Headquartered in Athens, Greece, Eurodry is committed to maintaining high operational standards and sustainability practices within the shipping industry. The company aims to capitalize on the growing demand for dry bulk shipping in emerging markets and actively pursues opportunities to expand its fleet. With a team of experienced maritime professionals, Eurodry focuses on providing reliable and efficient shipping solutions while ensuring the safety and environmental sustainability of its operations. By leveraging advanced technology and maintaining a modern fleet, Eurodry is positioned to meet the needs of its clients while navigating the complexities of the maritime sector. The company's strategic vision includes expanding its market share and enhancing its service offerings to better serve its clientele around the globe.

seo.meta_title: Eurodry Ltd. | Dry Bulk Shipping Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Eurodry Ltd., a leader in dry bulk shipping services dedicated to high operational standards and sustainability. Learn more about their fleet and services.

faq.question: What does Eurodry specialize in?
faq.answer: Eurodry specializes in dry bulk shipping services, transporting various commodities globally.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Eurodry?
faq.answer: George S. Koutalakis is the CEO of Eurodry Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Eurodry headquartered?
faq.answer: Eurodry is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
